data.title: Why is French a better language than English?
data.meta_description:
Answer (1 of 16): First of all I don’t agree that one language is better than another language in general, but in some aspects, one could be better than the other.

Let’s not talk about what a language can provide for a learner and other things. French is a better language to learn than English w...
